greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A partition product of Stirling_2 type [parameter k = -5] with biggest-part statistic (triangle read by rows).
comment: Partition product of prod_{j=0..n-1}((k + 1)*j - 1) and n! at k = -5,
summed over parts with equal biggest part (see the Luschny link).
Same partition product with length statistic is A049029.
formula: T(n,0) = [n = 0] (Iverson notation) and for n > 0 and 1 <= m <= n
T(n,m) = Sum_{a} M(a)|f^a| where a = a_1,..,a_n such that
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Mar 09 2009
